Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[decorate]]; to [[adorn]]
# [[ornament]]; [[decoration]]s; [[adornment]]s
# to [[cover up]]; to [[deceive]]
# to [[polish]]
# 61st [[tetragram]] of the [[Taixuanjing]]; "[[embellishment]]" ([[𝍂]])
